conversation.text: Based on your interest in "Random Hearts" and its deeper-than-expected tone, I understand you're looking for movies that explore complex themes, perhaps with a touch of the unknown or unexpected twists. From our list, I recommend "Wings of Desire", which features a poignant exploration of human connection and longing, set against the beautiful backdrop of Berlin.
